message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit too steep for me.  Would you consider $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $135, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $137.50?
Thanks for countering, Alice.  $137.50 is still a bit high for my budget.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $118.75?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $130. I can meet you halfway on the last offer, so how about $123.75?
Alice, you're getting closer!  I'm willing to go up a tad.  How about $121?
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. I can do $125, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about $127.50?
